meta.defaultTitle: Rustrade - Steam Turbine Manufacturing and Supply
meta.defaultDescription: Rustrade LLC is a leading supplier of power equipment and services for power plants. Design and supply of steam turbines from 25 kW to 40 MW.

turbines.driveDesc: Equipment drive or alternative to electric motor
turbines.lowPowerDesc: High-speed steam turbines of full factory readiness with capacity from 15 to 4000 kW
turbines.condensingDesc: General steam turbines with capacity from 4 to 120 MW

hero.title: High-efficiency steam turbine solutions
hero.description: Our solutions significantly reduce the cost of energy projects and generate benefits even where it was previously impossible.

services.title: Turbines and Services
services.description: We focus on customer needs and select the optimal solution. We bring the best world experience, clear design and 15 years of experience.
services.designDesc: Turnkey design and construction of energy facilities
services.rkdDesc: Adaptation and translation of working design documentation

about.title: About Company
about.description: Rustrade LLC was founded in 2020. The company's mission is to provide Customers with the opportunity to purchase quality and cost-effective solutions based on steam turbines.

cases.title: Cases
cases.sugarFactoryDesc: Replacement of outdated turbine with high-efficiency unit of full factory readiness
